/usr/bin/cc  -Wall -O2     CMakeFiles/freenect-glpclview.dir/glpclview.c.o  -o ../bin/freenect-glpclview -rdynamic ../lib/libfreenect_sync.so.0.5.2 -lGLU -lGL -lSM -lICE -lX11 -lXext -lglut -lXmu -lXi -lpthread -lm ../lib/libfreenect.so.0.5.2 /usr/local/lib/libusb-1.0.so -Wl,-rpath,/home/david/libfreenect/examples/lib:/usr/local/lib:
